mapper.select: select * from d_member m , d_kidcard k , d_reserve r where m.idx = k.d_member_idx and k.idx = r.kid_idx and m.idx = 130

select k.idx ,k.d_member_idx ,k.k_name ,k.k_birth ,k.k_gender ,k.k_introduce ,k.k_care_type ,k.k_tendency ,k.teacher_type ,k.k_require from d_kidcard k ,d_reserve r where k.idx = r.kid_idx and r.kid_idx = #{idx}
